response.overview: The credits - Monia, Jean Bryant, Venus, 'Buch' Adams, Tom Chapman, Tom Byron, Max - include some very unlikely names. Aside from the first two and Max (presumably Bellocchio) these seem wholly erroneous - compounded by a flash for VCA Pictures and a directorial credit for Henry Pachard. The actual male cast seems exclusively Italian and includes Francesco Malcom and Silvio Evangelista.
response.title: Monia...La Pantera Rossa
